changes.text: Biometric login added. A Face ID / Fingerprint option now appears on the login screen once enabled in Settings.
New bottom sheet system introduced for smoother UI interactions across screens such as Services & Specials and Settings.
Enhanced payment-method and earnings charts with tap-to-filter support and dynamic active-point display.
Segment control upgraded so detail values reset and hide until a chart point is tapped.
Tablet layout improvements across Workers, Transactions, and Settings for better portrait and landscape responsiveness.
Sticky headers updated with better spacing, elevation, and full-width alignment.
FAB buttons now appear correctly on Android in landscape mode and on tablets.
Bottom sheets and modals now reposition properly with the keyboard and avoid hidden content.
Login screen animations and layout polished; biometric button now appears contextually.
Android app icon updated to use correct light-color version.
Stronger password validation added to browser reset flow to match in-app complexity rules.
Transaction detail fallback logic added so a missing API record loads gracefully from the cached list.
Improved OSRM distance and matching logic on server with consistent fallback routing.
Fixed bottom sheet blank-space bug caused by keyboard closing.
Fixed landscape layout issues where some screens displayed misaligned or cut-off content.
Fixed issue where chart active-point values remained visible when switching segments.
Resolved custom tab bar hook error ('Rendered fewer hooks than expected').
Fixed text overflow issues in service lists and transaction cards.
